/* * The code follows the instructions from REACT Official Document * https://legacy.reactjs.org/tutorial/tutorial.html * https://zh-hans.react.dev/learn/tutorial-tic-tac-toe */ /* * Square function * 1. `export` indicates that this function can be used outside this file * 2. `default` indicates that this function is the main function of this file */ export default function Board() { /*1. keyword `return` will return the following info to the caller * 2. --> a close tag * 6. The react return can only return one element. * Wrong: return ; * Correct: use <> () to wrap * 7. use
to change the position！！！！！！ */ return ( <>
) } /* * 1. to avoid redundancy, here the `Square` component is created * 2. To update the value, we have to pass the {value} from parent component (Board) to child component (Square) */ function Square({value}){ function handleClick(){ console.log("clicked!"); } return }
